title: Bug 19089: No Popup Menu in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
description: The bug report is related to the absence of a popup menu in the Java editor ruler in the Photon version.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. It should trigger a popup menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc., but no such menu appears.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a Java editor is open and you right-click on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear, allowing users to add breakpoints, marks, and other related functionality. However, in the Photon version, this popup menu is missing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. This action should trigger a popup menu with options to add breakpoints and marks, but in the Photon version, the menu does not appear.
